attributes.action: Provide Hippo Bins for every Primary School in The United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: 2 No Hippo Bins per School. A grey one for general waste and a green one for recycling.
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the government to debate the use of Hippo Bins in school playgrounds. We believe Hippo Bins will encourage young children to gather litter with joyous abandon, promoting a cleaner society for them to enjoy and be proud of.

rejection.details: This would be the responsibility of your school and not the UK Government or Parliament.
